content.data:
[Y]Editorial Signoff
[W]Keep it curious and keep it kind.
[c][m.]
[W]When you share tools and notes,
[W]everyone improves and the scene gets
[W]stronger.
[W]If your experiment fails, write what
[W]failed and someone else will finish
[W]it.
[c][m.]
[G]- Share findings.
[G]- Credit people.
[G]- Keep backups.
[m][m-]
[Y]EDITOR NOTE
[C]Smart, cheeky and generous is the
[C]AMSHOLE way.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
